channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Disability-rights arguments grow heated at Supreme Court, though sweeping ruling appears unlikely
item.description: A disability-rights case at the Supreme Court grew unusually heated on Monday, including accusations of lying and references to one side’s position being a potential “five-alarm fire.”

item.title: Vehicle smashes through Illinois building, killing 4 young people and injuring others
Black female WWII unit, ‘Six Triple Eight,’ to receive congressional honor
